DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether listen music time embryo transfer reduce anxiety level woman undergo assisted conception treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Randomised Controlled Trial Effect Music Women Undergoing Assisted Reproductive Technology Treatments .
DOC.detailed_description: An assessor-blinded randomized case control study IVF center , England UK randomise woman 'music ' ( listen self-selected music embryo transfer ) 'control ' ( music ) group . Participants complete Spielberger State-Trait Anxiety Inventory prior , immediately follow post-treatment observation period . Total score compare .
DOC.criteria: Eligible participant woman age 2540 year , undergo IVF ICSI fresh frozen embryo completion February 2013 December 2013 . Women unable consent hear impairment exclude .
